alert.note: Alert for Muskingum (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:24PM EDT until April 05 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR GUERNSEY...SOUTHERN COSHOCTON...NORTHEASTERN MUSKINGUM AND SOUTHWESTERN TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES... At 624 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Coshocton to 9 miles west of Cambridge to near New Concord, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Coshocton, Cambridge, Newcomerstown, New Concord, Byesville, West Lafayette, North Zanesville, Dresden, Antrim, Port Washington, Pleasant Grove, and Conesville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
